survey_name: Local Farmers' Market Vendor Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from vendors at local farmers' markets to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges, and suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall experience as a vendor at this farmers' market?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall experience as a vendor at this farmers' market?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following facilities or services provided by the market do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include a text field for 'Other' if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following facilities or services provided by the market do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced as a vendor at this farmers' market?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Encourage vendors to share specific issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced as a vendor at this farmers' market?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to continue vending at this farmers' market in the next season?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood. Ensure clarity in response options.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to continue vending at this farmers' market in the next season?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the farmers' market experience for vendors?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable suggestions. Keep the text field sizable for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text area input field for longer open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the farmers' market experience for vendors?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
